column17: Sapphire has some of the finest Hard Anodised Cookware and Pressure Cooker but apart from just looks Hard anodising is much more Hard Anodising is not a coating but is an integral part of the metal built up molecule by molecule to a thickness of more than 50 microns by a carefully controlled electrochemical process. This completely transforms the soft Aluminium surface into an extremely stable and hard surface which is equivalent to the hardness of the precious stone Sapphire (about 2.4 times harder than steel). Hard Anodized cookware will not peel crack pit or rust & is surpassed for durability. Hard Anodized cookware does not tarnish is non-toxic and non-staining Hard Anodized Aluminium utensils are common utility domestic products required by almost all the states of society with a continual demand having an ever rising trend because of its strength durability and hygienic nature.

column17: Sapphire has some of the finest Hard Anodised Cookware and Pressure Cooker but apart from just looks Hard anodising is much more Hard Anodising is not a coating but is an integral part of the metal built up molecule by molecule to a thickness of more than 50 microns by a carefully controlled electrochemical process. This completely transforms the soft Aluminium surface into an extremely stable and hard surface which is equivalent to the hardness of the precious stone Sapphire (about 2.4 times harder than steel). Hard Anodized cookware will not peel crack pit or rust & is surpassed for durability. Hard Anodized cookware does not tarnish is non-toxic and non-staining Hard Anodized Aluminium utensils are common utility domestic products required by almost all the states of society with a continual demand having an ever rising trend because of its strength durability and hygienic nature.
